Class Droplet

java.lang.Object
com.github.cowwoc.digitalocean.resource.Droplet
public final class Droplet extends Object
A computer node.

  • Method Details

    • getById

      public static Droplet getById(DigitalOceanClient client, int id) throws IOException, TimeoutException, InterruptedException
      Looks up a droplet by its ID.
      Parameters:
      client - the client configuration
      id - the ID
      Returns:
      null if no match is found
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - if any of the arguments are null
      IllegalStateException - if the client is closed
      IOException - if an I/O error occurs. These errors are typically transient, and retrying the request may resolve the issue.
      TimeoutException - if the request times out before receiving a response. This might indicate network latency or server overload.
      InterruptedException - if the thread is interrupted while waiting for a response. This can happen due to shutdown signals.

    • getByName

      public static List<Droplet> getByName(DigitalOceanClient client, String name) throws IOException, TimeoutException, InterruptedException
      Looks up droplets by their name.
      Parameters:
      client - the client configuration
      name - a name
      Returns:
      an empty list if no match is found
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - if any of the arguments are null
      IllegalArgumentException - if name contains leading or trailing whitespace or is empty
      IllegalStateException - if the client is closed
      IOException - if an I/O error occurs. These errors are typically transient, and retrying the request may resolve the issue.
      TimeoutException - if the request times out before receiving a response. This might indicate network latency or server overload.
      InterruptedException - if the thread is interrupted while waiting for a response. This can happen due to shutdown signals.

    • getByTags

      public static List<Droplet> getByTags(DigitalOceanClient client, Collection<String> tags) throws IOException, TimeoutException, InterruptedException
      Looks up a droplet by its tags.
      Parameters:
      client - the client configuration
      tags - one or more tags
      Returns:
      an empty list if no match is found
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - if any of the arguments are null
      IllegalArgumentException - if any of the tags contain leading or trailing whitespace or are empty
      IllegalStateException - if the client is closed
      IOException - if an I/O error occurs. These errors are typically transient, and retrying the request may resolve the issue.
      TimeoutException - if the request times out before receiving a response. This might indicate network latency or server overload.
      InterruptedException - if the thread is interrupted while waiting for a response. This can happen due to shutdown signals.

    • creator

      public static DropletCreator creator(DigitalOceanClient client, String name, DropletType type, DropletImage image, Vpc vpc)
      Creates a droplet.
      Parameters:
      client - the client configuration
      name - the name of the droplet
      type - the machine type of the droplet
      image - the image ID of a public or private image or the slug identifier for a public image that will be used to boot this droplet
      vpc - the VPC that the droplet will be deployed into
      Returns:
      a new Droplet builder
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - if any of the arguments are null
      IllegalArgumentException - if:
      • the name contains any characters other than A-Z, a-z, 0-9 and a hyphen.
      • the name does not start or end with an alphanumeric character.
      • any of the arguments contain leading or trailing whitespace or are empty.
      IllegalStateException - if the client is closed
      See Also:
      • Vpc.getDefault(DigitalOceanClient, Zone)

      public Droplet reload() throws IOException, TimeoutException, InterruptedException
      Reloads the droplet's state.
      Returns:
      the updated state
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if the client is closed
      IOException - if an I/O error occurs. These errors are typically transient, and retrying the request may resolve the issue.

    • matchesState

      public boolean matchesState(DropletCreator state)
      Determines if the Droplet matches the desired state.
      Parameters:
      state - the desired state
      Returns:
      true if the droplet matches the desired state; otherwise, false
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - if state is null

    • renameTo

      public Droplet renameTo(String newName) throws IOException, TimeoutException, InterruptedException
      Renames a droplet.
      Parameters:
      newName - the new name
      Returns:
      the updated droplet
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - if newName is null
      IllegalArgumentException - if:
      • the name contains any characters other than A-Z, a-z, 0-9 and a hyphen.
      • the name does not start or end with an alphanumeric character.
      • any of the arguments contain leading or trailing whitespace or are empty.
      NullPointerException - if newName is null
      IllegalArgumentException - if newName contains leading or trailing whitespace or is empty
      IllegalStateException - if the client is closed
      IOException - if an I/O error occurs. These errors are typically transient, and retrying the request may resolve the issue.
      TimeoutException - if the request times out before receiving a response. This might indicate network latency or server overload.
      InterruptedException - if the thread is interrupted while waiting for a response. This can happen due to shutdown signals.
